summary: Spellsword/One Handed focused follower with Custom CBBE, Base CBBE, and Base UNP body options.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]PorterHause's Mae Little-Fire
[/b][/size][/color]
Based on PorterHause's Character on his [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8B86C6tlovtQIX3IgvdDKQ]YouTube channel[/url].
Permission granted for follower creation by [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9220568/?][font=Verdana]SgtZodiac[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/crxjydh1j/20170105223814_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6rdva9czr/Story.png[/img]
[/url][i][font=Verdana]Mae Little-Fire is the niece of Tish Stone-Flower from Tish's oldest brother Torbald. While growing up
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]she idolized her aunt and sought to be just like her. As a child she begged her father for lessons with[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]sword, shield and bow. Mae's mother Arika opposed the training preferring her daughter pursue more[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]intellectual and household skills. Torbald made a deal with his wife and suggested they split Mae's[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]training between the two. Mae however wanted very little to do with her mother's training and focused[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]almost solely on combat. By the time she was 14 she was the best swords-woman in their village and[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]could out hunt any man. Her feats, diminutive stature and somewhat short temper earned her the name[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]Little-Fire.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]On her 17th birthday, her Aunt Tish came to visit and gave Mae a special made sword, shield and[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]armor. Thrilled beyond words Mae re-vowed to be like her aunt.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]A couple months later tragedy struck when her father went to visit Mae's grandfather Carag and help[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]him with the construction of new barn. While there the Imperials attempted to arrest Carag, Torbald[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]and her Uncle Erik suspecting them of aiding the rebellion. All three were killed and her aunts and[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]grandmother were missing.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]Distraught and fearing for her daughter and herself, Arika fled to the east with Mae where they made[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]their home in Windhelm. Arika forbid Mae from joining the Stormcloaks or do any fighting at all.[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]Saddened and depressed Mae obeyed at first but then tales began to circulate of a fierce redheaded[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]warrioress who fought with axe, bow and the voice of the Dragons. Tales of this woman's daring and[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]savage pursuit of the Imperials were the topic of conversation almost every night at the taverns and[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]markets. It did not take long for Mae to figure out that this warrioress was none other then her Aunt[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]Tish. Wishing to join Tish in her fight, Mae gathered her belongings and went looking for her leaving[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]behind her wildly distraught mother.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]Mae always seemed to be a step behind her aunt and never did catch up to her until after the war was[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]won and the Imperials vanquished.

[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]Mae finally reunited with her aunt in Whiterun. Delighted to see that her spindly legged little tomboy[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]niece had grown into a furious fighter Tish took her in.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]Tish worked with Mae to complete her training turning a raw impulsive young woman into a fighter of[/i][/font][i][font=Verdana]no small skill.
[/font]
[/i][font=Verdana][i]Nowadays when Tish is out of town, Mae spends her time escorting caravans and hanging out at the[/i][/font][font=Verdana][i]Drunken Huntsman.[/i][/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Mae Little-Fire
Race:  Custom Nord
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .92
Weight:  80
Body:  Custom CBBE; Base UNP & CBBE
Skin:  Leyenda
Armor:  Steel Nord Plate Bikini Armor (Custom CBBE Only)
Weapons:  Dragonbone Sword, Steel Shield, Ebony Bow & Arrows
Location:  Whiterun - Drunken Hunstman

Class:  Spellsword
Style:  Boss One Hand

Levels with player.
Skills/Bonuses:  One Hand, Block, Restoration, Archery, Heavy Armor

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/ar70djkw7/20170107003406_1.jpg[/img]

[youtube]nWFUVQq405c[/youtube]

Dawnguard

HDT Compatible Skeleton

[/u][/b]
Dawnguard

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from SgtZodiac/PorterHause.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
